name: Subscription
description: Subscription bootstrap: initializes owner records, persistence state, and SaaS Google OAuth callbacks.

publicUrl.description: Public base URL used for OAuth links (example: https://your-domain.example).

googleOauthStartPath.description: Public path for starting Google OAuth. Defaults to /oauth/google/start.

googleOauthCallbackPath.description: Public callback path for Google OAuth. Defaults to /oauth/google/callback.

googleOauthScopes.description: Optional Google OAuth scopes in addition to openid/email/profile.
